document_data.name: Andarsphisk Hawkspike
document_data.Activities: Andarsphisk was one of the two surviving leaders of [[Thurbrand and Arley, Wendra of the Willing Whips, and Splendors of the Shining Sea Importations]], which was situated in the poor quarters of [[Suzail]].
document_data.History: Around [[1480 DR]], Andarphisk and his partner [[Drounan Harbrand]] were paid by Lady [[Jalassra Dawningdown|Dawningdown]] to go to the remote and secret prison stronghold of [[Castle Irlingstar]] in the [[Thunder Peaks]] on the eastern border of [[Cormyr]].
